00037 #include "egs_transformed_source.h"
00038 #include "egs_input.h"
00039 
00040 EGS_TransformedSource::EGS_TransformedSource(EGS_Input *input,
00041         EGS_ObjectFactory *f) : EGS_BaseSource(input,f), source(0), T(0) {
00042     EGS_Input *isource = input->takeInputItem("source",false);
00043     if (isource) {
00044         source = EGS_BaseSource::createSource(isource);
00045         delete isource;
00046     }
00047     if (!source) {
00048         string sname;
00049         int err = input->getInput("source name",sname);
00050         if (err)
00051             egsWarning("EGS_TransformedSource: missing/wrong inline source "
00052                        "definition and missing wrong 'source name' input\n");
00053         else {
00054             source = EGS_BaseSource::getSource(sname);
00055             if (!source) egsWarning("EGS_TransformedSource: a source named %s"
00056                                         " does not exist\n");
00057         }
00058     }
00059     EGS_AffineTransform *t = EGS_AffineTransform::getTransformation(input);
00060     setUp(t);
00061     delete t;
00062 }
00063 
00064 void EGS_TransformedSource::setUp(EGS_AffineTransform *t) {
00065     setTransformation(t);
00066     otype = "EGS_TransformedSource";
00067     if (!isValid()) {
00068         description = "Invalid transformed source";
00069     }
00070     else {
00071         description = "Transformed ";
00072         description += source->getSourceDescription();
00073         source->ref();
00074     }
00075 }
00076 
00077 extern "C" {
00078 
00079     EGS_TRANSFORMED_SOURCE_EXPORT EGS_BaseSource *createSource(EGS_Input *input,
00080             EGS_ObjectFactory *f) {
00081         return
00082             createSourceTemplate<EGS_TransformedSource>(input,f,"transformed source");
00083     }
00084 
00085 }
